DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect lanthanum carbonate calcium carbonate serum FGF23 level hemodialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Lanthanum Carbonate Fibroblast Growth Factor 23
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator enrol patient maintenance hemodialysis randomize two group . One group receive lanthanum carbonate another group receive calcium carbonate . The investigator compare serum FGF23 level two group receive medication 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old Chronic renal failure maintenance hemodialysis 3 time week least 3 month Serum calcium:810.5 mg/dL Serum phosphate:3.56 mg/dL ( washout period ) Serum phosphate â‰§6 mg/dL washout period Serum iPTH : 150600 pg/mL Diabetes mellitus Post parathyroidectomy Life expectancy < 6 month Liver disease ( hepatitis B , C liver dysfunction ) Severe gastrointestinal disorder severe comorbidity Poor compliance Intolerance lanthanum calcium carbonate Active infection Malnutrition ( serum albumin < 3 g/dL clinical assessment ) Kt/V < 1.2 ( inadequate dialysis ) Serum phosphate > 7.5 mg/dL washout period
